sentences.sContent: With his gentle eyes and comely smile, he still leaves a sense of fortitude for his delicate nose and thin lips.
sentences.sContent_eng: With his gentle eyes and comely smile, he still leaves a sense of fortitude for his delicate nose and thin lips.
sentences.sCn: 他目光柔和，笑容清秀，精致的鼻子和薄薄的嘴唇却给人一种坚毅的感觉。

sentences.sContent: Lin jiaxin belongs to temperament melting model belle bingle lets her look resemble a false boy complaisant straight hair can foil more those who give her is melting and comely!
sentences.sContent_eng: Lin jiaxin belongs to temperament melting model belle bingle lets her look resemble a false boy complaisant straight hair can foil more those who give her is melting and comely!
sentences.sCn: 林嘉欣属于气质甜美型的美女，短发让她看上去像个假小子，柔顺的直发更能衬托出她的甜美清秀！

remMethod.val: come(来) + ly → 吸引别人过来 → 动人的
